website_summaries.verdict: Provides the perfect warm glow for any indoor or outdoor occasion.
pros: 8 lighting modes – combination, wave, sequential, slow, flash, slow fade, twinkle, and steady
Small lights and thin wire are easy to hide
cons: Lights periodically have a string that doesn't work or arrives dead

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount these little lights give off very luminous without the bulky wires. Very good price and covered two windows .
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Sada

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: These look great installed in the front windows for Christmas. Already received compliments from the neighbors on how nice they look.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Really good!!
customer_reviews.text: I really underestimated the size of these things! Anyway,lol,they are soooo good!!(especially for the price!!)
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product
customer_reviews.text: We set them up in my daughters room. great light color - warm white. Created a cool lighted wall in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lundgren

customer_reviews.title: We purchased these for our wedding tables to twist in ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our wedding tables to twist in with our greenery. They worked perfectly but one arrived dead so I'm knocking off one star.
customer_reviews.author: sbgsbg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these little lights. They made my mantel, banister, and small wall tree glisten this holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Caring friend

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights, great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for a cosplay I was working on! The light is pretty bright (more even than some I've bought with bigger battery packs), the pack is conveniently small (note, it takes two big button-cells, so I imagine they aren't quick to change, but the box does come with a tiny screwdriver), and you can't beat the price (six strands for only double the price I've paid for single strands with big battery packs). The wire is flexible, yet also firm (unlike typical, limp holiday lights), which helps with placing / shaping. The lights and pack stay pretty cool, too. They worked out so well, I bought a second box!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfen M

customer_reviews.title: Great item at a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 3 packs of these and have given some away to friends. They are awesome and I plan to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have liked them a bit better if the on-off switch was ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked them a bit better if the on-off switch was smaller or even able to fit into a wine bottle. But looks really nice when lit!
customer_reviews.author: SpoonComplex

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and useful, will order more
customer_reviews.text: These led copper wire lights can more easily be wrapped around something like a tree or fence or whatever. I put mine in some plants and they look so beautiful and sparkly! They all 10 ft long, and it’s perfect to decorate plants or fence etc. Compared with 3.3ft or 7.2ft or even 32 ft long lights of other seller, I think 10 ft just the right length, and other length lights are either too short or too long. And the screw driver is really useful, so it’s very easy to replace the battery after it run down. I absolutely love these and will order more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... lasting but they get the job done and are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: not the longest lasting but they get the job done and are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: My Untidy Life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for my season wreaths for the front door.
customer_reviews.author: christy tharpe

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: We just put them up outside as Christmas decorations last week. It's rained and snowed and they're doing fine. I would recommend buying washers to put at the bottom of them so they don't get entangled with one another. We do however have trouble getting them to sync and all do the same pattern I feel like each string of lights pattern is programmed a little differently and we haven't figured it out yet.
customer_reviews.author: mom2008

customer_reviews.title: After 2 days outside - stopped working...=(
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as "indoor/outdoor", so put them on front porch...plugged in...and 2 days later...they don't work anymore. I feel duped.
customer_reviews.author: uthaman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but inconsistent functionality
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to hang in our sun room and strung them together. They look great, however the first strand in the sequence resets to a flashing mode every time they are plugged back in, while the second one stays in the mode we set it to (solid on). This requires having to manually reset the one strand every day - I guess it's better than having to do both. Other than that they are nice, seem to be of high quality and are very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Light Your Night!
customer_reviews.text: These little light strings are amazing! I was a little skeptical when I ordered them, as the price seemed almost "to good to be true" (and my Daddy warned me years ago about deals like that); but these little sparklers are real gems! So far I have placed them inside glass candle holders and used them to light up a small Christmas three. And just as the item description says, the copper wire is indeed easy to bend and mold so the string fits whatever item I am using them with. I couldn't be happier with them!
customer_reviews.author: DowntownLady51

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Update- I requested a replacement and they stopped working while I was hanging them. Do not buy. These lights looked great when we first put them up. The problem is that the next day the lights would randomly shut off and the setting that keeps the lights on steadily, as opposed to flashing, doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Brightens up a boring room.
customer_reviews.text: This brightens up my living room but I can’t use the lights constantly on setting. The lights dim after a while. But the slowly blinking setting is still cute and it doesn’t feel like I live in a cave anymore. I imagine it would look cool if you put the lights around a wall full of photos.
customer_reviews.author: Bobeica Silvia-Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don't last
customer_reviews.text: The idea a battery powered light string is great however, the batteries don't last. The lights start going dim just in a few hours. I've replaced the batteries twice since my purchase. Considering purchasing the fairy lights with an electrical outlet plug. The company was willing to refund me my money. If you only going to use this item one time (such a wedding or party) great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to get working.
customer_reviews.text: I was quite disappointed with the overall quality. It was inexpensive but I still paid money for it and expected it to work well. I was very unhappy at how much time and effort I had to put into it to work. Not worth the time I lost. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: Very NIFTY String Light
customer_reviews.text: A very NIFTY set of LED string lights. Very pleasantly surprised at the brightness of these lights. No battery box like so many have with the AAA battery requirements, easy to hide and does not stand out or get in the way- a big BONUS! Using these in some bottles (where else) as you can see in the image we have attached. Warm White is an excellent choice of color that really enhances the effects in a bottle. We have tried some cool white but they have no-where near the effect of these warm white string lights.
customer_reviews.author: Gary VanSickle

customer_reviews.title: Tangled mess
customer_reviews.text: Returned them. Came in a huge ball of tangled wires. Plugged them in to see if even worked before I spent hours untangling and glad I did...strands were burnt out.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Griswold

customer_reviews.title: ... LED light than anything that resembles a warm light like in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: these are more of a white/blue typical LED light than anything that resembles a warm light like in the pictures. Other than the color of light which does not need to go in my house (it's for a church function) they are great. But if I had bought them for myself I'd be pretty upset because I would not allow blue light to be in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing for about a week then quickly faded and died and I only had them on for a couple hours a day whereas similar lights I've had for longer are still going strong. I guess these are great if you need them for a one time event like a party but expect them to be disposable. (Disclaimer - changing the battery might fix my problem, I recognize, but then I'd have to buy the specific batteries and I don't want to spend more money on these).
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Annibal

customer_reviews.title: Missing the “steady on” chord from the control panel.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today. I was very excited to put it on my bedroom wall and after I plugged it in and went through the modes to see which I liked best, I realized the 8th mode “steady on” isn’t an option.. and upon investigating the control panel for the lights I realized I only have 7 wires and I’m missing the 8th that would make it possible for the lights to only stay on and not flash or glow slowly. Very disappointed, going to ask to exchange.

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best string-light buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This might be the best buy for this type of product. I actually bought a few different kinds and these are definitely my favorite of the bunch. I was wrapped a large wreath and two pine boughs i made each in one of these. These are brighter and the length provided great coverage. I can't wait to figure out a use in the Summer.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Garbage after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Totally useless after 6 months , only two strands are working. Worked great for the first 6 months until it turned to trash. Will not waste more money from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: john dough

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, bright lights...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, TINY lights (barely the size of a rain drop) that show up well at night. Easy to turn on and to wrap around whatever you want. I put ours on our front gate- 4 strands- and on our mail box- 2 strands. Just started using them so don't know how long battery lasts... I turn them on when I get the mail at the end of the day and off when I get the newspaper in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Allen

customer_reviews.title: I am so delighted with these
customer_reviews.text: I am so delighted with these! Just the right size for a window garland, 2'-3' tree or wreath, very lightweight, easy to operate---not 5 thousand choices of blinks just on and off. Well packaged, well sealed on ends, nicely coiled without being a mixed up mess. I was pleasantly surprised at these inexpensive yet unexpectedly good value lights..
customer_reviews.author: blacklily

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle, twinkle little lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are just fab, a great copper color wire is used to connect the LED's and they are bright! I also liked the length of each pack, perfect for my project, and the battery pack is easily concealed. All in all a really well-made, attractive product at an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: These are terrific. They look great and are easy to place ...
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific. They look great and are easy to place anywhere since they run on battery power rather than having to plug in. My only complaint is how quickly the battery dies. I would turn them on in the evenings (part of my Christmas decorations) and if I left them on all night by the second night they would be dim or dead. But, a new battery could easily fix that. Instead I just used another strand since there were six in this purchase! It was quite a good deal for the price relative to what I've seen them cost elsewhere. I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Two of the six did not work when I took them out of the box. The set I’m using now only lights for three hours and the batteries are dead. I should have returned them. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I went through looking at dozens of these lights. I love that these plug in have multiple light settings and look beautiful. They are no soft white though they are more yellow but they look amazing
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth l

customer_reviews.title: they are so versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 6 pack of these sweet little lights and used them in colored wine bottles. They look so pretty, they are like little fireflies. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: cathleen c

customer_reviews.title: Burning out within 30 mins!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and missed the callout of 110 volts. PLugged in after cheking the box and the plug and it stated 110-230 and preceeded to burn them out, please update description and on the box to help make sure this is picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Hoani Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: These LED string lights are amazing. They are extremely bright and only one strand ...
customer_reviews.text: These LED string lights are amazing. They are extremely bright and only one strand lit up my fake palm tree. best thing is I don't have to worry about being near an outlet. I could have added another strand to the truck, but It looked great the way it was. Also, the copper string is very pliable and molds to how you want it, in addition to being very lightweight. Also, I love that they are out of site, when it is daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Comeau

customer_reviews.title: Very sad..
customer_reviews.text: The lights lasted about 2 evenings and then went out. Replacement batteries costs more than the 6 pack. Very sad...as they looked great when you first use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Roberts

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for my childrens' weddings. I wrapped them around green wine bottles and they looked beautiful. I bought extra batteries jsut in case they didn't last for the event, but it wasn't necessary and they were lit all afternoon and evening with the batteries still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Too darn cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these in the past so this is a reorder. I use them in small mason jars, sometimes with potpourri & cut out lids, & give them as little gifts. Everyone loves them & I have a hard time parting with them. I'm certain I'll be reordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I love how there are like 10 different light modes. They appear super flimsy, we will see if they last.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Grisanti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because they seem so delicate. Boy was I wrong. I put them up outside and the next day we had very high winds. I was sure they wouldn't make it, but they did! They are easy to use and very bright. I'm really impressed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DS TX

customer_reviews.title: Very festive, but lights dim as battery drains
customer_reviews.text: These lights are amazing - festive, easy to maneuver, and the perfect length for decorating a mantle or potted plant without having to use a plug. My only issue with them is how fast the battery drains - they start to dim after about 5 hours, and go almost completely dark after about 24-30 hours. So I've had to be strategic about turning them on and off, but overall I would recommend them for a quick, cheap, and convenient way to decorate!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work really well, and they last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Stahler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I received this quickly and they were just what I expected. They were perfect for a small arrangement and the battery pack is small, so it can be concealed easily. I would buy these again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Brown007

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights for my daughter's sweet 16. We had to decorate a large gym with very few outlets. We strung them on the walls & it looked beautiful. Every strand worked with the batteries that were provided and we had them on for 6 straight hours without any problem. They were very bright for such timy lights. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: EVH

customer_reviews.title: Finally a light string that will last
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Product as pictured and described. Really like the low temp LED lights, and ability to shape the copper string any way we want. We use these short strings for inside decorations (Dickens villages, wreaths, and such). Also ordered a long strand (50') to use as outdoor highlighting, intertwined with our garland. A little pricey, but I'm tired of buying cheap light strings 2- and 3-times.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: On Over 24 Hours!!
customer_reviews.text: The Headline says it all I left these on for over 24 hours and the lights were still light enough to see they were on in the daytime, They don't get hot and I was able to wear them wrapped around my torso to see and be seen very well at night.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I only tried one string. They are very bright ...
customer_reviews.text: I only tried one string. They are very bright lights. Unfortunately, they are too bright. I am looking for warm white to blend in with my candle light. These are bright white lights.
customer_reviews.author: Carolma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Will buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: Totally more the I expected. They did arrive a few days later than expected, but they did arrive! They came with batteries and a tiny screwdriver to open the unit and change the batteries when needed. The lights are bright. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly C

customer_reviews.title: Bright and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are perfect for decorating flower arrangements, wreaths, etc. The copper wire is easy to wrap in any direction. I love the way they look and I plan to buy more. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B

customer_reviews.title: but these are great if you need them in a place that you ...
customer_reviews.text: I would recomend the one that plug in. Battery life is short, but these are great if you need them in a place that you cannot plug in. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Owens

customer_reviews.title: Delicate, pretty lights!
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful, decorative lights. I use them around my desk at work, around my bed frame at home, and in clear glass vases for an inexpensive yet decorative and unique way to light up my living room. I love that they are battery operated too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Idrissi

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. I was surprised that it was still lit ...
customer_reviews.text: I used one to help decorate a sign I made to help direct people to our Christmas party. It worked great. I was surprised that it was still lit up the next morning when i went out to take down the sign. I was also surprised and very happy that the batteries were included. I am going to use the rest to help decorate the inside of the house.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable. But they don't last very long
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. But they don't last very long. I only turned them on in the evenings, and not even every night over Christmas (maybe 3-4 nights/wk for 3 weeks) and then were burnt out by that time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not a curtain
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I thought it was from the pictures. It was just string lights and not a “curtain”
customer_reviews.author: Diva3482

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, but batteries don't last long enough.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are nice and easy to put on a small tree, wreath or other decoration, but the batteries do not last long (not enough for the whole Christmas season) and are difficult to change. One must remove 4 small screws and this is tedious.
customer_reviews.author: raspberryhill

customer_reviews.title: Great product/great value!
customer_reviews.text: Six (6) sets of lights for less than the price of one (1)! Nice mini copper light strings all work perfectly...great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Decorating
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them yet....but they are the perfect size and lighting for the areas in my home regular electric lights will not work due to need for electrical cords. The soft light is great!
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accent!
customer_reviews.text: I love these string lights. The length is great with just the right number of lights so not to be too overwhelming. They are bright and will add a beautiful special effect to displays at my daughter's wedding!
customer_reviews.author: A. Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Great mini lights.
customer_reviews.text: These little light were better than I expected. Just the right size for want I needs them for. I was amazed at how many lights were on the string.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa LeClerc

customer_reviews.title: and I really like them! The battery pack is easy to tuck ...
customer_reviews.text: I just put one string of these lights on my Christmas wreath, and I really like them! The battery pack is easy to tuck behind and the lights put off a very nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked to give these lights a higher rating as they ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to give these lights a higher rating as they were easy to use-however, the batteries do not last long at all. The batteries are however replaceable, but it's not an inexpensive battery. Would have preferred to pay a little more money upfront and have a longer life battery.
customer_reviews.author: Townhouse

customer_reviews.title: Bright & Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bright and last for a very long time. Was impressed with the length and the way they handled as well. I used one to illuminate the manger of a nativity scene, another was used
customer_reviews.author: talenuf

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for I think they will make beautiful lights in a fairy garden
customer_reviews.author: shyrl-ann hunt

customer_reviews.title: Diappointed in battery life
customer_reviews.text: Lights worked for 3 nights-on for about 4 hrs. each night. Seems like short battery time. I have some similar but take 3 AAA batteries and they last a lot longer. On the plus side, these are bright-wouldn't say warm lights. Disappointed in the short battery life.
customer_reviews.author: BLH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our wine cork trees
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go on wine cork trees that my friends and I all have. They are perfect!!! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: DevonH

customer_reviews.title: These are lightweight and absolutely beautiful. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is it! I am done with the big ugly heavy loaded wirey Christmas lights. These are lightweight and absolutely beautiful. You will not be disappointed. Fast shipping. Just be sure to measure out what you need. After using several I find it convenient having one section all on one (or two) strings to make off/on simple.
customer_reviews.author: SSOLDO

customer_reviews.title: String lights
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more pleased with the string lights. They are really beautiful. I was so happy to see the high quality workmanship that goes into making the lights. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & EZ to use
customer_reviews.text: I have made nightlights for our screen porch & my daughter's room. These + mason jar = awesome Get the extra batteries. They dont have that long of a life...
customer_reviews.author: PololvrTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Meets expections.
customer_reviews.text: Five out of six work. Only one had the little tab between the switch and battery. All in all they are inexpensive, work well and meets expections.
customer_reviews.author: T Klaw

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT! I'm back for my second order
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT! I'm back for my second order. Every place I had a tea light I now have these. They're brighter and very easy to use. What a great product! I'd give them 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kai McKnight San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! I can leave them on all of the time without anything getting hot. It's great, too, to be able to place my Christmas tree anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sara L. B.

customer_reviews.title: order incomplete
customer_reviews.text: they came and the lights are really pretty but the description says they come with a remote and these did not come with a remote which is why I went with these, the more expensive option. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great for places you cannot plug in. They are bright and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Batteries won't last.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries wont last 2 days. I bought them for a small christmas decoration and turn them on at night. The lights started to fade on the second day and on the third day i didn't turn on at all. I used 4 of them. I had to buy another one from other vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Jpdipolo

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these for her bedroom. These lights are very nice and bright. Perfect to add a little lighting without having to worry about plugging them in. I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: jnhoov

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. All six lights worked beautifully. I used them to light up clamp jar that housed a gift card. Everyone that received the jar love them. It makes for a special gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, no feedback
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and I have had no report on how the lights performed.
customer_reviews.author: Lida M. Harshman

customer_reviews.title: Bright and durable
customer_reviews.text: These work very well, they are very bright and quite durable. Used them during a holiday party were on for 8+ hours and are still very bright.
customer_reviews.author: gcooper

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with vendor and product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with vendor and product. Shipped right away. The lights are surprisingly very bright. Batteries were included. The lights are on a thin copper wired. Was afraid delicate. But I was wrong. One strand was perfect for lighting up the wreath on my front door. Used the others in the garland on the staircase. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dave & Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Love these things! So cool! They work well, and the wire is so thin, you can bend it and fit it nearly anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: BotaMan

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty and will make our cocktail tables sparkle
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used them yet as our event is 3 months away. However we put them in a vase and turned off the lights for a dry run. They are pretty and will make our cocktail tables sparkle!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very bright when they arrive. Great customer service. I used then inside a liquor bottle (turned into a memorial lamp) and they beamed even through the thick green glass.
customer_reviews.author: Hiiroxanne

customer_reviews.title: WOW...love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little lights!! Cannot believe the price is so incredibly low on this product. May need some more for our outdoor umbrella!!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful around my 10 ft tall Italian Cypress trees
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful around my 10 ft tall Italian Cypress trees, buying another one. The different settings are great. I am going to keep them up all year long. They arrived same day with my Amazon Prime, wowza!
customer_reviews.author: 350zgrl

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT! Love the fact they are water resistant
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT! Love the fact they are water resistant.....they worked really well in the terrarium I put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Eno

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use and energy sufficient
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and energy sufficient. It is a very good product to decorate my Christmas tree, I love it so much! and Its fast shipping. 2 days before the delivery day!
customer_reviews.author: CeeCeerun

customer_reviews.title: Magical lights
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little lights, so easy to place and the copper wire makes them look even better. I was impressed with the 1 year guarantee also. Makes these even more of a value.
customer_reviews.author: Scotiae

customer_reviews.title: Fun and festive.
customer_reviews.text: Fun and festive. You will have to hide the thin white battery box but that's easy with greenery or decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Light

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pretty for what I used them and was happy with ...
customer_reviews.text: 3.5 stars would.have gone for 5 stars however had 2 that I think may be battery issues (Im hoping). I wanted.to use them right away so didnt return. Extremely pretty for what I used them and was happy with how they looked.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepfan

customer_reviews.title: Festival of lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these little lights! I put them over plants, wreaths, in jars! They make everything look so festive!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Bright tiny lights
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and much brighter than another brand of tiny lights that I purchased. I would buy from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great. They will be great for our wedding. I will be buying more today.
customer_reviews.author: laelle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One set was up for about a week and then did not work!!!! As of 1/5/17 none of them are working......very disappointed. I will use the second set you sent me for next year. I appreciate all the attention you have given me but am really not happy with the lights! They looked so pretty for the short time they worked
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great size for throwing in a glass vase, flower arrangement
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H.

customer_reviews.title: Sensational and a huge bargain
customer_reviews.text: These are Sensational AND a huge bargain Bought for making centerpieces for a party Tall cylindrical vases,a little sparkly snow in the bottom(to conceal the very small battery pack) and a string of these lights kinda pushed down inside. Beautiful! and classy,adding a bit of sparkle to the room. And equally important,compare the prices,these were about $2.00 each string (batteries included)as opposed to $8.99 a string (batteries NOT included)) with the strings having fewer lights,clunky( big battery pack requiring 3 AA batteries (not included),no beautiful copper wire at Michaels,Hobby Lobby and other hobby type merchants.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Loved these! I used them for my daughter's wedding ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! I used them for my daughter's wedding and they were perfect!

customer_reviews.title: otherwise very pretty. Overall
customer_reviews.text: One out of 18 lights didn't work, wires were criss crossed so I unable to straighten out the cord, otherwise very pretty. Overall, happy with the product.

customer_reviews.title: It's so amazing and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's so amazing and beautiful. Perfect for Halloween decoration..Very easy to make shapes. We love this product, will definitely recommend to our friends.

product_meta.title: Milemont Window Curtain String Lights Fairy Twinkle Icicle Starry Lights for Wedding Christmas Party Home Garden Bedroom Outdoor Indoor Wall Decorations, 9.8ftx9.8ft Warm White
product_meta.description:
Window Curtain String Lights, Fairy Twinkle Icicle Starry Lights for Wedding Christmas Party Home Garden Bedroom Outdoor Indoor Wall Decorations, 9.8ftx9.8ft Warm White



We have more elaborate designs:

1.Transparent copper core wire

The 5 copper wires are 1.6mm. The wire is covered in the clear plastic which is really flexible, conductive and durable.



2.Advanced Lighting Source

F5 concave lamp bead, super high brightness. Reference LED Glue-pouring technology, the source of light is a row of LEDs, which disperses light very well, providing powerful lights and a better waterproof performance.



3.More Designs for You

These window curtain string lights can connect 3 sets together with the Waterproof misplug-proof male & female connector, eliminate your troubles when you connect more numbers.



Specifications:

Voltage: 110V

Size: 9.8ft x 9.8ft

LED Color: Warm White

LED Quantity: 300

String Drop Qty: 10

Material: Plastic+Copper

Plug to the controller: 2ft/ 0.6M

Cable color: Transparent white

Waterproof: IP44

Lifespan: 50,000 Hours



PLEASE BE NOTED:

 1. Waterproof level is IP44, but the controller is non-waterproof, so the item can not be used in heavy rain or soaked in water.
 2. The White buckle is to fix the main power cord line,this cannot be cut, otherwise the string lights will be separated and lead to the string tangling.
feature_bullets: 8 MODES OF LIGHTING - Combination, in waves, sequential, slow-glow, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on, With just one button for switching modes

HIGH QUALITY and SAFE - 9. 8FT x 9. 8FT, 300 LED warm white lights, transparent copper core wiring, waterproof(IP44) . UL Certificated Output, wire and plug, so that the string lights are safer than regular versions.
EASY TO USE- Directly plug in and unplug it for powering on and off. UL certification outlet, voltage 110.

WIDE USE - Fairy icicle window curtain lights for indoor and outdoor decorations. For Weddings, Parties, Christmas, Valentine's Day or alternatively in your home, window, bathroom, restaurant, hotel, commercial building or shopping center etc.
YOUR SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - 12 Months Warranty, 30 Days Money Back Guaranteed. Risk free buying.
